thread.title: Mrs Joy Pontin
thread.title_full: Blinds 2go reviewed by Mrs Joy Pontin

author: Mrs Joy Pontin
title: Mrs Joy Pontin
text: Having already purchased some of your blinds which I fitted by turning the brackets for side fixing (as I was unable to drill into my window opening soffit due to the type of lintel fitted), when I opened the box for this blind, I was concerned about the fitting as the brackets were different. Sure enough, when I again tried to fix the brackets, I was unable to drill. However, I overcame this by fixing a wooden plate to the soffit using glue and side brackets and am now very pleased with the finished effect as the plate is hardly visible. The blind works well and gives us the finish we hoped for. Thank you for an excellent service and prompt delivery.
